title: GitLab security advisory (AV26-114)
description: On February 10, 2026, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.8.4, 18.7.4 and 18.6.6
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 18.8.4, 18.7.4 and 18.6.6
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
